TEXT.S:
EthiopiaEthiopiaEthiopiamalkaputay masakakuay atu makumud a kanatal (A-mu-ha-la a kamu:S የኢትዮጵያ ፈደራላዊ ዲሞክራሲያዊ ሪፐብሊክnu La-tin: ye'ītiyop'iya federalawī dīmokirasīyawī rīpebilīki), hamin u Ethiopia (ኢትዮጵያʾĪtyōṗṗyā ), nanu itidaay i Africakitidaan u masacacay a misulul mikuwan kya kanatal. saamis atu sawali nu amis atu Eritreaku misulul a mikuwanay sawali atu Ci-pu-tiatu Somalia(u nu caay hen kaw katinengan i kitakit palatateng tu Sul-ma-li-lan) a misulul mikuwan, i satipan u Su-tan atu timulan a Su-tan ku mikuwanay, nu timulan u Ken-ya ku mikuwanay. Ethiopiau muenengay malakuwid tu cacay a yi' nu tademaw, i kitakit nu tademaw u sayadahay i labuay tu nu kanatal, u sakatusa kayadah nu tademaw i Huy-cul a kanatal (mikilul satu u Nay-ci-li-ya). u Ethiopiau ahebal nu lala' 110 a mang nu pin-huwang-kun-li, tuse atu satabakiay a tuse i A-di-si-a-pe-ba.[1] (u kamu nu Hulam: :የኢትዮጵያ ፈደራላዊ ዲሞክራሲያዊ ሪፐብሊክ:ye'ītiyop'iya federalawī dīmokirasīyawī rīpebilīkiኢትዮጵያʾĪtyōṗṗyā ·1110) nu tawya nika tukuh ayda cacay a lasubu nu mang a mihca nu malumanay han a zidayu sumamad, nika idaway tu nu muenengay itini alaw katuud satu ku tademaw. sabaw siwa a se-cicaay henay kalaliyas ku Huy-cul, Ethiopiau masacacay hen ku masalaheciay midemecay tu O-culnu tayniay a tademaw, sakahini nu luma'ay tu a nipilian malahunti nu tatangahan i Huy-cul a kanatal. 1974 a mihca, na kinacacay ku malalais nu kasumadan ku hitay i 1930 a mihcaan ku nika hida sa u Ethiopiatu ku mikuwanay a hungti ci Hay-er-Say-la-si-yi-se mabeling haw sa, u Ethiopiamibulic tu nu hungtiay nipikuwan, patideng u men-ke-si-tu ku dikecay tu mikuwan nu hitay a sihu, sika malu nu singanganay tu siykay nu masakaputay, nu dikudan i 1990 a mihca patukuh a miales tu siykay nu masakaputay. 1991 a mihca, u nu Albaniaya hul-ca-paymidikec tu Ethiopiaren-min-ke-ming-min-cu-cen-siyan "ay-ke-cen" maala ku heni tu a ningayawan, kyu u heni tu ku mikuwanay, 2019 a mihca sabaw tusa a bulad idaw ku cacay a demiad, u ay-ke-cen maliwasak tu, nikahini u nikasasulitan misumad palu manamec ku sakaudip nu kawaw.[2] (u kamu nu Hulam: 1001919741930·19901991;2019121.)
nilaculu Ethiopiasa ilabu nu Africa, itiza i 8 00 N, 38 00 E u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 1,104,300 km2u ahebal nu lalaay sa izaw ku 1,000,000 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 104,300 km2hamin nu tademawan sa 102,374,044. kakalukan umahsa 36.30%, kilakilangan umahsa 12.20%, zumaay henay umah sa 51.50%
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Addis Ababa.
kakininan nu kanatal demiadkakining nu kanatal demiad sa 28 bulad 5 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Sahle-Work Zewde (Sale-Wueke.Cude -·), 1950 a mihca 2 a bulad 21 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Ethiopiaayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2018 a mihca 10 bulad 5 demiad. u cunli nu Ethiopiaayza sa ci Abiy Ahmed, micakat a demiad sa i 2018 a mihcaan 4 bulad 2 demiad.
laylaynanaayaway atu aydaayEthiopiau nu kasumamadan a kanatal, satabalay idaw ku nu hulicay a sakatinengan i kung-yun 1-7 a se-cinu A-ke-su-mu a kanatal. sabaw tulu a se-ci, A-mu-ha-la a tademaw patideng tu sul-lul-men-wang-caw, malingatu misuayaw tu A-pi-si-ni-ya a kanatal matulin ku nipikuwan micapi tu makaala 700 nu mihca, teban nu se-ciu A-pi-si-ni-ya u nuwalian a Africau tabakiay saicelangay a kanatal, nu aydaay a lala' katukuh ayda u Sudanatu Somalia, sakay i sabaw enen a se-cikakilukilul sa mademec tu ku Er-tu-man a kanatalatu Portugala tademaw a midebung.[3] (u kamu nu Hulam:1-71370016) sabaw siwa ayaw nu se-ci, Ethiopiamalula'cus ku yadahay a masakaputay a kanatal, caay katatudung ku mipikuwan nu hungti, sakahini "sikalawlaw nu wang-ce a zitay". sabaw siwa a se-cinu pangkiw sa, Yin-kul, Italymakakilul satu midebung. u Italymipadang tu, nu milakalakay a wan-ce Meng-ni-li-ke-er-semulekal malingatu tu misacacay tu Ethiopia, sakayni i 1889 a mihca malahungti tu.[4] (u kamu nu Hulam: 19""191889) 1890 a mihca, u Italypacudad tu hitay a wasasimaw kina kanatalan, Meng-ni-li-ke-er-semibabelih tu paculi, saayaway u ItalyEthiopia mangangayaw tu. i enemay a mihca nika ngangayaw tu nadikudan sa, ya madebecay kya Italypalutateng tu Ethiopiau mahcacayay tu. 1963 a mihca, u Italyci Mul-sul-li-niya muculculay tu hitay pakatusa tahekal i Ethiopia, yu mahini malucek ku mabayu tu siledekay a bali nu hitay, sika hina hungti ci Hay-er-Say-la-si(·) mulakalak tu i Yin-kul.[5] (u kamu nu Hulam: 189061936·) katukuh i 1941 a mihca, Italykina tusa aca midademec a malpacawpacaw i nuwalian a Africamalalais mademec nu Yin-kul, nu malimatay i Eritreamakuwan tu nu Yin-kul, Hay-er-Say-la-si(·) kyu mananukas aca i tusutu tatungusan, saka i cen-cipasayda tu i Amilika, Yin-kul. "Ethiopia" ya ngangan nu kanatal yu mahini u malucek u tatengaay tu.[6] (u kamu nu Hulam: 1941·"")
kuhi nu Ethiopiau tatangahan a enal nu kuhi i Ethiopia, sakusaan kyami ku kamu ya masacacayay mahatedep nai'ay ku ngangan nya pasidiay a tademaw ci Ka-tiKaldia i satipan a kitidaan nu Ethiopiana pahabay tu sidi i kilakilangan sa, makatepa tuyni kapah ku siwbay katukuh ayda kaliyuh han u sumanahay a heci: kuhi, pacakayay i icibatu kuhi na nu yaanay tu hakya a malebud nu mihcaan ku nikaidaw. Ethiopianu aydaay mahida tu i kitaki u kahenulan pasadakay tu kuhi a kanatal, u sakasadakan a kitidaan idaw ku Sidamo, ye Yirgacheffe, Kochere, Harar, Djimma.[7] (u kamu nu Hulam: Kaldia:SidamoYirgacheffeKochereHararDjimma) nai i Ethiopiaaynu timulan Sidamo, Yirgacheffe, Kochereu nu nanumay ku sabanaw a lihum nipaluma'an a kitidaan, u sakapahay sisanekay tu bangsis nu heci atu matatudung ku kapah misabeliway ku bangsis kyu singangan. Yirgacheffeu Sidamonu adidi'ay a cen-se, u nu Ethiopiasakatinengan ku kapah nya kakitidaan a palumaan, tu mihmihcaan ya udad sa ditek nu bayu ku katinegan ku talakaw naw 1,850 katukuh 2,400 ku hatida nu ditek nu udad 1,300mm, kamu nu ayaway u suemed saan kya imi, teban ku cila kanca idaw ku tahpuay atu miselepay tu kapah u "mitahpuay tu ladem", "mitahpuay tu kuten", u micidekay kya liwliw nu sakaudip atu nu masadumaay a kakanan, sisa namakay i Sidamomahcacay namakayda ku katahkal i nipalumaan.[8] (u kamu nu Hulam: 1,8502,4001,300mm"""") Kocherenaitida i Yirgacheffepaytimulan 25 kung-li nu adidi'ay a nika tahkal a kitidaan, u i tidaay ku enen idaw ku 10,000 nu tademaw kahatida u palumaay tu kuhi nu malukay, u katuuday a muenenay nu tademaw u sakaudip nu heni sa u mipeluay tu kuhi, u tenes nu laylay nu i tidaay a nipaluma' mipelu tu kuhi Heirloom, uyni a nika sadak idaw ku talaayaway tu a misinanud tu kuhi nu mantaay a kikay, sisa ya beliw nu bangsis micidekay. Harari Ethiopiaya sawali i talakaway a enal i kitidaan, zayhan sa mabaad kya kididaan, malakuday kya kitidaan nika i akuti'ay i maacakay ku demiad, kyu u heni han nu kasumamadan ku kawaw u niacakan atu misinanudan.[9] (u kamu nu Hulam: 2510,000Heirloom) nu kasumamadanay a Ethiopiamibamenis mipili' tu la'cusay a kuhi, nibanawan u mantaay a kuhi sa mamenis han G1(Defects 0-3) atu G2(Defects 4-12u nu cila a nipawalian tu mantaay a kuhi G3(Defects 13-25)G4(Defects 25-45)G5(Defects 46-100), 2008 a mihcaan malingatu tu, patideng ku sihu nu Ethiopiau nipangangan nu niyam sa u ECX (Ethiopia Commodity Exchange) masakapud, na makaycuwaay a kididanay a kuhi tu mantaay maminay tu nisinanutan kya pataydan i tida i talakaway, a mikinsaen aca kya a mibamenis tu bangsis, ya nimamenis tu kuhi idaw ku nipalumaan atu cacay kaw nipalumaan a nikasisadak nu bangsissay, misawantanan aca tu nika bamenisan ku bangsis, u sakapahay a kuhi a hinien tu nu dumaay a nipalumaan anu macakay kyu idaw ku sadak i kitidaan tu sakapahay a mantaay a kuhi.[10] (u kamu nu Hulam: G1(Defects 0-3)G2(Defects 4-12G3(Defects 13-25)G4(Defects 25-45)G5(Defects 46-100)2008Ethiopia Commodity Exchange ECX)
